item.title: CVE-2023-47672|2024-08-28T14:36:22.768Z -- swashata -- wp%20category%20post%20list%20widget
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Swashata WP Category Post List Widget.This issue affects WP Category Post List Widget: from n/a through 2.0.3.
